patthana23.58:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhatto dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana23.58:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhā dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana23.58:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.58:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.58:5.1_0: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
